articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Choummaly Saynasone, president of Laos who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Monday.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Brazil
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Brazil
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Luiz Inacio Lula Da Silva, President of Brazil, on its independence day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations favorably developing between the two countries on the principle of respect for sovereignty would grow stronger in the future and sincerely wished the President greater success in his noble work for the welfare of the Brazilian people and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Club.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by Tran Tho Chu, chairman of the club who doubles as chairman of the Vietnamese Committee for Supporting Korea on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Textile Mill
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here visited the Pyongyang Textile Mill on Monday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They were briefed on the fact that the mill has developed into the nation's powerful textile-producing centre before going round various places of the mill. 
					
					 At the end of the visit, they made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, wrote that the mill has made a great contribution to improving the standard of people's living in the past, wishing the Korean people steady success in building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Valerie Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, wrote that the mill has turned into a modern textile-producing centre under the deep care of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 Sarveshwar Puri, representative of the WHO, wrote that he deeply felt that the DPRK has a rosy future as it is led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Arrive
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, arrived here today on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Arrivals on the same day included a delegation of the Information Telegraphic Agency, ITAR-TASS headed by Farit Alyautdinov, its deputy director-general, and Kanji Inoki, representative managing director of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held at Mt. Myohyang and Mt. Chilbo Resorts
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held at Mt. Myohyang and Mt. Chilbo Resorts
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibitions were separately held at Mt. Myohyang and Mt. Chilbo resorts from Sept. 1 to 7. 
					 Displayed there together with various species of flowers were potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, the immortal flowers, cultivated by officials and other working people in North Phyongan and North Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 The venues of exhibitions were crowded every day with officials and other working people, school youth and children, foreign guests and overseas Koreans visiting Mt. Myohyang and tourists visiting Mt. Chilbo.
					
					 While visiting the exhibitions, they expressed boundless reverence for the peerlessly great persons who splendidly built up the country and demonstrated the dignity and might of the DPRK to the whole world.

articles.title: Performance Given by Workers' Art Squad of C.C., GFTUK
articles.content:
Performance Given by Workers' Art Squad of C.C., GFTUK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The workers' art squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea gave its performance at the Central Hall of Workers Monday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Put on the stage were colorful numbers dealing with the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the signal progress made by the DPRK.
					
					 In chorus "Fly Our Tricolor National Flag of the Republic", female duet and pangchang "We Sing of Our Motherland Holding the Leader in High Esteem" and other numbers the performers enthusiastically sang of boundless gratitude to the President who founded the DPRK in which the people have become its master, providing them with a genuine life and happiness.
					
					 Also put on the stage were male solo "General on a Galloping White Horse", serial song "The Blue Sky over My Country", short play "The Place Where We Are Obliged to Stand", chorus "Believe Tomorrow" and others. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and Kim Pyong Phal, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship Closes
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship Closes
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Martial Art Championship for September 10 Prize closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Monday.
					 The Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do team placed first in team standing by giving a good account of itself in various events.
					
					 Present there were Minister of Urban Management Hwang Hak Won, chairman of the Taekwon-Do Association of the DPRK, officials concerned, players and youth and students.

articles.title: DPRK Emerges Victorious with Might of Harmonious Whole
articles.content:
DPRK Emerges Victorious with Might of Harmonious Whole
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has covered a proud course of 60-odd-year-long history in which it has won victory after victory with the might of the harmonious whole of the leader and the people.
					This harmonious whole is the source of all the victories for the Korean people.
					
					 The accomplishment of the historic cause of national liberation and the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War which the leader and people won with the strength of their close ideological and purposeful unity shine with the prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 Though everything was short in the postwar years, world-startling miracles were wrought one after another in the DPRK where the leader and the people were united as one.
					
					 In December Juche 45 (1956) when the internal and external situation was so grave, President Kim Il Sung visited the workers of the then Kangson Steel Works. He earnestly said that if they produced 10 000 tons of steel additionally it would greatly help the country and called upon them to tide over the difficulties of the revolution, firmly believing each other.
					
					 Thanks to his love and trust, the great Chollima era was ushered in this land and the Korean people could adorn the annals of the revolution with heroic epics.
					
					 The workers of Kangson rushed ahead at the speed of Chollima, shattering passivism and conservatism. In the course of this, they wrought a miracle of turning out 120,000 tons of steel from the blooming mill with a capacity of 60,000 tons.
					
					 The flame of innovation kindled in Kangson spread all over the country as a torchlight for the grand Chollima march. The furnace-men of the then Kim Chaek Iron Works produced 270,000 tons of pig iron from a furnace with a capacity of 190,000 tons while the automobile-makers manufactured the trial lorry in a matter of 40 days.
					
					 Constructors of the capital built 20,000 flats with materials, funds and manpower for 7,000 flats and the railway constructors completed Haeju-Hasong railway project, that would take three to four years, in two and a half months. Such great leaps were made on all sectors of the socialist construction.
					
					 With the might of the harmonious whole, the Korean people realized in 14 years the industrialization that had taken hundreds of years in other countries and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Today the leader-people harmonious whole which is being consolidated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the basic guarantee for the DPRK to win victory after victory in the teeth of any trials and difficulties.
					
					 The DPRK will demonstrate its dignity as an invincible socialist powerful state in the coming years, too, along with the history of the harmonious whole of the leader and people.

articles.title: Great Life for People
articles.content:
Great Life for People
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are yearning more earnestly for President Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life to the struggle for liberating the country from the yoke of the Japanese imperialist rule and for providing happiness to the people with the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea drawing near.
					 The President devoted himself for the people throughout his life with "The people are my God" as his constant view and motto.
					
					 He started his revolutionary activities in his teens and waged a bloody anti-Japanese war for building a country where the working people are the masters and at last accomplished the historic cause of national liberation. 
					
					 After the liberation of the country, he called at the Kangson Steel Works (present Chollima Steel Complex) before visiting his native home in Mangyongdae which he had not forgotten even a moment for 20 years and discussed state affairs with its workers.
					
					 He promulgated the Agrarian Reform Law to satisfy the desire of the peasants to do farm in their own land to their heart's content. He visited a farmhouse in a remote mountainous area where he took a measure to provide an affluent life to the people in the area, talking with a peasant over night.
					
					 At a steel works, he instructed officials to blow up the outmoded electric furnace dangerous for workers and placed the issue of pencil as an agenda-item of the first meeting of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea though there were many pressing problems to be solved for the building of a new society.
					
					 After descending the platform of the rally held in celebration of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, he directly headed for a brickyard to solve the brick issue for the construction of people's dwelling houses.
					
					 He had given field guidance to all parts of the country for the happy life of the people from the day when the country was liberated to the last moments of his great life.
					
					 During the on-the-spot guidance, he met with lots of people of all strata and listened to them to work out popular policies comprehensively representing their will.
					
					 Seeing a rural woman carrying a water jar on her head on his way of field guidance, he saw to it that the Party Congress adopted the issue of providing water services to the countryside as a decision. Although the country had not enough finance, he made sure that a large sum of state funds was earmarked for education and that the people could enjoy free medical service.
					
					 The Korean people are still holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the permanent President of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Military Strong Arm Policy towards DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Military Strong Arm Policy towards DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- It was reported by Reuters recently that a Lieut. general of the U.S. Air Force disclosed the U.S. military was in the process of securing 10~12 Bunker-Busters for  the purpose of destroying underground nuclear facilities, etc. of the DPRK and Iran. The U.S. military was reported to have stepped up the production of the above-said bombs for striking "enemy" underground facilities by use of Stealth bomber B-2s, etc.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said facts indicate that there is no change in the U.S. military strategy for aggression aimed at bringing the anti-imperialist independent countries under its control by force and realizing its wild ambition for domination and it is getting more undisguised in it day by day, posing ever greater danger to them.
					
					 The U.S. military strong arm policy towards the DPRK is a vivid manifestation of its extreme hostility towards the DPRK and its socialism and Washington's sinister scenario for the second Korean war.
					
					 Neither change nor progress can be expected in the DPRK-U.S. relations and the issue of denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula as long as the above-said policy persists.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its war deterrent in every way and further consolidate the anti-imperialist military front in order to protect the sovereignty, security and peace of the country and the nation from the grave moves of the U.S. imperialist warlike forces to launch a war of aggression against it.
					
					 The U.S. is required to review its history of confrontation with the DPRK. Washington would be well advised to avoid making a harmful option, drawing a lesson from it.

articles.title: Korean People Called upon to Emerge Victors in Gigantic Drive for Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Korean People Called upon to Emerge Victors in Gigantic Drive for Building Thriving Nation 
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's great advance for building a thriving nation is sure to be crowned with a victory as they are dashing ahead, united close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a jointly signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Noticeable changes unprecedented in recent years have taken place in socialist construction in the DPRK this year.
					
					 The workers in the field of metal industry, a pillar of the socialist self-supporting economy, have achieved leaping progress in production in hearty response to the torch kindled in Kangson.
					
					 Keeping pace with this, not only those in the field of coal industry but those in the field of power industry are boosting the production with each passing day and those in the domain of machine-building industry are working fresh miracles.
					
					 The scientific and technological revolution is gaining in scope and strength thanks to the above-said great advance.
					
					 The drive for bringing about miracles and innovations is going full steam ahead not only in the heavy industry but in the light industry and the agricultural field. The same can be said of the centrally controlled industrial establishments and locally controlled industrial ones.
					
					 All industrial establishments, be they big enterprises or small factories, and the units with favorable conditions or with unfavorable ones set ambitious goals and are now honoring their assignments.
					
					 A great surge is now being effected in the literary and art, sports, education and public health, land administration and city management and other fields. Masterpieces are being produced thanks to a signal turn being effected in the movie industry in the era of Songun and spectacular successes are being registered to create sensation in the world sports circles. All these achievements are greatly delighting the Korean people.
					
					 The nation is witnessing a stirring reality in which it is taking on the looks of a thriving nation in all aspects ranging from the ideological aspect to economic life and from the appearance of streets and villages to people's style of dressing and diet.
					
					 The DPRK's goal to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 is scientific and it is sure to triumph. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung's nation led by Kim Jong Il has an invincible banner, tremendous mental power and solid military and economic foundations and potentials which no other countries and nations have ever possessed.

articles.title: Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Mt. Paektu Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Mt. Paektu Called for
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu is the source of strong mental power of the servicepersons and people in the DPRK and serves as an everlasting treasured sword for working miracles. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial. It calls for intensifying the charge in this spirit to win victory in every work site for effecting a great surge.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the fighting spirit displayed by the revolutionary forerunners while making long journeys of bloody anti-Japanese battles and pushing their ways through endless snowstorms under the commandership of President Kim Il Sung, is the spirit of making charges overcoming any difficulties, an indomitable fighting spirit and a spirit of independence to build a socialist land of bliss by one's own efforts.
					
					 The might of the above-said spirit has been fully displayed in every year of the Korean revolution which has stood stern tests.
					
					 The spirit has served as an engine that helped bring about ceaseless upswing in the building of socialism in the DPRK and represented the revolutionary mettle of the Korean people who know nothing impossible. 
					
					 The victory in the 70-day campaign which culminated in creating a new speed of advance in the 1970s and the victory in the 200-day campaign which resulted in providing all the domains of the national economy with a bright prospect of successfully carrying out the 3rd Seven-Year Plan, dealing telling blows at the anti-socialist moves of the enemies in the 1980s, were unthinkable without the wise leadership given by the Workers' Party of Korea to the Korean people to live and struggle in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The extraordinary mental power fully displayed by the Korean people in the struggle for winning a victory in the drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge is based on the above-mentioned spirit.
					
					 Ardent patriots in the era of Songun are being produced and epoch-making miracles and changes are reported from every place pervaded with the above-said spirit.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Marked by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Marked by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a meeting in Moscow on Sept. 3 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Choe Pong Gil, chairman of the confederation, in a report said that the DPRK has dynamically advanced the socialist cause guided by the Juche Idea, the Songun idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The reporter said that the government of the DPRK is absolutely trusted and supported by the people as it represents the independent rights of the popular masses, organizes their creative ability and activities and takes care of their living in a responsible manner. 
					
					 Those who took the floor next said that the yearnings for the President grow stronger with each passing day as he liberated the country and glorified it as a dignified and powerful country.
					
					 They evinced the determination of overseas Koreans to make positive contributions to building a great prosperous and powerful nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, cherishing national pride and self-esteem.

articles.title: Joint Seminar Held in Uganda
articles.content:
Joint Seminar Held in Uganda
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of the Ugandan organizations for the study of the Juche idea on the subject of "The Songun politics is a model of independent politics" was held at Kyambogo University on Sept. 1 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Baguma Isoke, chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, addressing the seminar, said that the Songun politics of the DPRK is one for defending and achieving the independence of the country and nation, a politics reflecting the popular masses' demand and desire for independence. 
					
					 Speeches were made then.
					
					The speakers said that invincible is the Songun politics based on the Juche idea pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the 1990s he firmly armed the entire army and all the people with the Songun idea and developed the Korean People's Army into invincible ranks, an army strong in faith through ceaseless field inspections of it, they said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will surely fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Blitz Publishing House of Bangladesh on Sept. 2.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), expounds the idea that the six decade-long history of the DPRK was a history of great struggle and victory and that of great creation and change in which the Korean people defended the independence and honor of the country and built a rich and powerful and prosperous socialist country weathering the tempests of revolution under the guidance of the great leader and the great party, and that even a small and backward country can become a developed and dignified power when it has a great leader and great party.
					
					 The work also indicates the task for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun, and ways to do so.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Sweden and Ethiopia
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Sweden and Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Swedish national preparatory committee and the Ethiopian preparatory committee were formed with due ceremonies on Sept. 1 and 2 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees at the ceremonies.
					
					 The committees decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including meetings, film shows and photo exhibitions till April 20, 2012.

articles.title: Invariable Faith
articles.content:
Invariable Faith
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected a unit of the Korean People's Army associated with revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 87 (1998).
					 At the unit he first climbed up Mt. Jihye where the monument to field guidance of the President is standing.
					
					 He saw the monument conveying the President's Songun leadership exploits with deep emotion.
					
					 Standing in front of the monument for a long while, he said in a hoarse voice that as he greeted April 15 on the forefront, he could not pay a tribute to the President at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, asking those accompanying him to pay respects to the President in front of the monument on Mt. Jihye.
					
					 Then his deep voice "Attention, Salute!" reverberated throughout the mountain.
					
					 The tribute paid to the President on the way of inspecting KPA units was, indeed, his unwavering iron will to shine his revolutionary life and immortal feats for all ages with arms and the invariable faith to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country of Juche in this land without fail true to his instruction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Choummaly Saynasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Choummaly Saynasone 
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le dirigiera Choummaly Saynasone, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, en ocasion del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  El embajador lao en Corea, Chaleune Warinthrasak, lo entrego el dia 7 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente brasileno
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federativa de Brasil, Luiz Inacio Lula Da Silva, en ocasion del Dia de Independencia de este pais sudamericano.
					El remitente expresa su conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Brasil, que se desarrollan positivamente basandose en el principio de respeto a la independencia, y desea sinceramente al destinatario mayores exitos en sus nobles labores para el bienestar del pueblo brasileno y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Extranjeros visitan Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Extranjeros visitan Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang
  Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los representantes diplomaticos y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales de varios paises en Corea visitaron el dia 7 la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang.
					  Los huespedes recorrieron varios lugares de la fabrica escuchando explicaciones de proceso de la conversion de ella en una poderosa base de produccion de telas del pais.
					
					  Al final de la visita, ellos dejaron letras en el libro de visitas.
					
					  El embajador chino Liu Xiaoming escribio que anteriormente, esta fabrica contribuyo mucho al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y deseo al pueblo coreano exitos sucesivos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					  El embajador ruso Valery Sukhinin apunto que bajo la profunda atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la fabrica se ha convertido en una moderna base de produccion de telas.
					
					  El representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud, Sarveshwar Puri, aseguro que sera maravilloso el futuro de Corea gracias al Dirigente.

articles.title: Exhibiciones de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias en pintorescos montes
articles.content:
Exhibiciones de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias en pintorescos montes
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar del dia primero al 7 en los pintorescos lugares de los montes Myohyang y Chilbo las exhibiciones de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.
					En los respectivos lugares estaban exhibidas estas flores inmortales y otras plantas decorativas cultivadas por los funcionarios y trabajadores de las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte y de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					Los lugares fueron recorridos por los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares, los huespedes extranjeros, los coreanos en ultramar de  visita en monte Myohyang, los integrantes del grupo de recorrido al monte Chilbo y los turistas. 
					
					Los visitantes a dichas exhibiciones estaban envueltos en los sentimientos de respeto y veneracion sin limites hacia los grandes hombres sin parangon quienes hicieron acondicionar magnificamente los montes y rios de la patria y exaltar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el majestuoso aspecto de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena politica despotica militar de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena politica despotica militar de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Segun la agencia noticiera inglesa Reuters, el teniente general de las fuerzas aereas estadounidenses dijo que la capa militar de su pais impulsa la reservacion de 10 o 12 bombas supergrandes "Bunker-Buster" para destruccion de las instalaciones nucleares subterraneas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran.
					Ella acelera la produccion de estas bombas con el fin de cargarlas en el cazabombardero Stealth "B-2", que tiene la capacidad de superar la red de radar, para atacar las instalaciones subterraneas del "enemigo". 
					
					Esto comprueba que Estados Unidos mantiene invariablemente la estrategia militar agresiva de aplastar con la fuerza a los paises independientes y antiimperialistas y tal intento se intensifica cada dia mas.
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y prosigue: 
					
					    La politica despotica militar de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC es resultado de su conciencia hostil a la segunda y al socialismo y es expresion concentrada de su artimana tendente a desatar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					  Mientras que sigue tal politica, no podemos esperar ningun cambio ni avance en las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. y en el trato del problema de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					  Para hacer frente a las graves maniobras de las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses encaminadas a agredir al Norte de Corea, la RPDC consolidara por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra y fortificara con mas firmeza el frente militar antiimperialista para defender la soberania, la seguridad y la paz del pais y la nacion. 
					
					  EE.UU. tiene que hacer balance de la historia de confrontacion con la RPDC y sacar la leccion de ello. Le sera bueno hacer opcion util.
